ascii.description: Returns a readable version of an object. Replaces none-ascii characters with escape character

clear.description: Removes all the elements from the dictionary

copy.description: Returns a copy of the dictionary

fromkeys.description: Returns a dictionary with the specified keys and values

get.description: Returns the value of the specified key

items.description: Returns a list containing the a tuple for each key value pair

keys.description: Returns a list containing the dictionary's keys

pop.description: Removes the element with the specified key

popitem.description: Removes the last inserted key-value pai

setdefault.description: Returns the value of the specified key. If the key does not exist: insert the key, with the specified value

update.description: Updates the dictionary with the specified key-value pairs

values.description: Returns a list of all the values in the dictionary

tuple.count.description: Returns the number of times a specified value occurs in a tuple

index.description: Searches the tuple for a specified value and returns the position of where it was found

add.description: Adds an element to the set

clear.description: Removes all the elements from the set

copy.description: Returns a copy of the set

difference.description: Returns a set containing the difference between two or more sets

difference_update.description: Removes the items in this set that are also included in another, specified set

intersection.description: Returns a set, that is the intersection of two other sets

intersection_update.description: Removes the items in this set that are not present in other, specified set(s)

isdisjoint.description: Returns whether two sets have a intersection or not

issubset.description: Returns whether another set contains this set or not

issuperset.description: Returns whether this set contains another set or not

symmetric_difference.description: Returns a set with the symmetric differences of two sets

symmetric_difference_update.description: inserts the symmetric differences from this set and another

union.description: Return a set containing the union of sets

update.description: Update the set with the union of this set and others
